text: The 1996 ACC Trophy was a cricket tournament in Malaysia, taking place from 6th to 16 September 1996. It gave Associate and Affiliate members of the Asian Cricket Council experience of international one-day cricket and also helped form an essential part of regional rankings. The tournament was won by Bangladesh who defeated the UAE in the final by 108 runs. ==Teams== The teams were separated into two groups of six.
